channel.title: Aggroth v4 - Cache error? - anyone else getting this lately?
channel.description:
hello, I was trying to get this server going but ran into somekind of error. Please help if you can thank you.
1) I've downloaded Aggroth v4 2) Would download cache but not fully. 3) So i manually download the cache from it's link, and manually extract it to my C:/ drive
Works if you play! But i want to make it available so other people can play if i was to jar it. Which isn't possible if it wouldn't be able to download the cache!
4) Reupload the cache to dropbox 5) Changed the old cachedownloader.java link to the new one, changed a link in client.java that linked up to a different server cache 6) Compile! 7) Run
8) Received error
[IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2ptar6b.png[/img]

item.title: Aggroth v4 - Cache error? - anyone else getting this lately?
item.dc:creator: @geowayne geowayne
item.description:
@geowayne wrote:

hello, I was trying to get this server going but ran into somekind of error. Please help if you can thank you.

  1. I’ve downloaded Aggroth v4
  2. Would download cache but not fully.
  3. So i manually download the cache from it’s link, and manually extract it to my C:/ drive

Works if you play! But i want to make it available so other people can play if i was to jar it. Which isn’t possible if it wouldn’t be able to download the cache!

  1. Reupload the cache to dropbox

  2. Changed the old cachedownloader.java link to the new one, changed a link in client.java that linked up to a different server cache

  3. Compile!

  4. Run

  5. Received error

Read full topic
item.source: Aggroth v4 - Cache error? - anyone else getting this lately?
